welcome_message_body: Welcome to Pickerington, USA! Get ready to experience the charm of our quaint city, known for its beautiful parks, friendly community, and delicious local restaurants. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Pickerington has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Port Columbus International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Port Columbus International Airport primarily serves American Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Port Columbus International Airport primarily serves Delta Air Lines and Southwest Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Port Columbus International Airport primarily serves United Airlines flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rickenbacker Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rickenbacker Airport handles a large volume of freight and operates 24/7.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ohio State University Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Ohio State University Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi access is available throughout the airport.
